public class InstantMessage
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.lang.Runnable, java.awt.event.WindowFocusListener

Author:
Ashwin,Avijit,Sumedh,Hemendra This thread generates separate instatnt message window for each friend in the friendlist. It contains all the features for one to one chatting.
